titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1939 THEVES Madame Jean (Mlle Jachiet) 31 rue de la Fayette Nevers (Nièvre) Paris address 7 rue Méchan) Ker Bonne Aventure 20 rue Alfred de Musset Benodet Nantes, Loire Inférieure Finistere Hotel des Voyageurs, Nantes renewed 1 year 1 v A 200 10% paid Jan 20 red dep. 27 60
Dec 30 Christmas Holiday Jan 6 post Jan 5 4.30 It cant Happen Here deduct postage 9 frs going & coming returned Jan 8 6.50 Rebecca Feb. 2 Harlequin House Jan 19 Jan 19 Enchanters Nightshade Feb 7 Enbury Heath Feb. 2 27 Patriot postage to be Feb 15 27 Hope of Heaven deducted Feb 12 Feb 12 6.50 Everywoman Jan 5 8,60 March 2 " 12 God's Little Acre March 8 6.40 Feb 26 15.00 Feb 26 4.50 Appointment in Samara March 8 Mar 2 4,50 Colonel's Daughter March 18 March 8 3.20 Enbury Heath already had cancel March 12 postage & deduct March 11 (14,50) Boomerang return post 34,05 15.40 (S B took off postage twice going & coming as sent books already had) 18.80 Total postage due March 14 March 20 4.50 Nutmeg Tree March 26 March 27 6.50 Faster Faster April 12 March 27 Rueful Mating (Little Red Horses) 12 April 12 4.50 Plagued by the Nightingale April 24 12 Flamenco " 24 49.50 postage Dec 30 1939 - Ap 12 1940 49.50 sum to be deducted 15 (over) 34.50
postage (bro't ford) 34.50 20 rue l'Abbé du l'Epée Paris April 24 6.50 Without my Cloak sub. May 22 Big Money paid to May 22 Dec 30/40 Phoebe's Guest House May 22 May 18 4.50 Sparkenbroke May 29 (sent to 120 Route de Toulouse Bègles (Gironde) as per letter from E. Thèves) wrote May 29th to old address at Nevers June 3rd received letter from 25 rue Adam Billault Nevers, Nievres June 3 4.50 Epitaph on George Moore July 12 paid July 12 50.00 To Have & Have Not July 12
July 12 Poems, Shelley 2 vols July 25 25 Other Gods (1 franc a day) Aug 7 Aug 7 Brighton Rock Aug 27 7 Four Part Setting Aug 27 27 Adventures of a Young Man Sept 25 Sartor Resartus Sept 25 Sept 25 Letters of Thomas Carlyle Oct 14 25 Do What You Will Oct 4 Oct 4 Antic Hay Oct 14 14 Essays on Goethe Carlyle Oct 31 14 Way of All Flesh Oct 31 31 Brave New World Nov 6 31 Cakes & Ale Nov 6 Nov 6 De Mauriers Nov 14 Nov 6 Saraband for Dead Lovers Nov 14 Dec. 3 South Wind (ren. Jan 6) June 16 3 Jalna Jan 6 Jan 6 Alone Jan 31 Norman Douglas, Tomlinson Jan 31
THEVES To Jan 30 Madame Jean 1941 24 rue Denfert Rochereau Renewed Dec 30 1940 - Jan 30 1941 1941 2 vols A 40 (still has South Wind) Jan 31 Together Mar 13 Renewed Jan 30 - April 30 1941 A 2 vols 100 Me Theves returned Mr Norris Feb. 20 Mar 13 Pointed Roofs May 2 13 Honeycomb 2 13 Backwater 2 22 Tunnel 2 22 Interim May 2 May 2 Revolving Lights May 16 2 Trap May 16 2 D.M. Richardson (Powys May 16 Renewed April 30th - October 30th 1941 180v pd May 2nd 2 vols A
May 16 Ulysses June 16 16 Pilgrimage IV July 2 June 16 Dubliners July 2 16 After such pleasures July 2 July 2 Portrait of the Artist Sept. 11 Aug 1 Inhale & Exhale Sept. 11 Esther Waters Oct 24 Exiles Sept 11 Burmese Days Sept 11 Backward Son Grapes of Wrath Sept. 11 Who called that Lady a Shipper Sept. 11 Sept. 11 Ulysses Oct 24 Chamber Music Oct 24
1939 Jachiet Feb 8 Serenade (owes 4v 6v) 2v 15 15 Ballerina (18v owes) + 10v = 28v Mar 21 Mar 22 National Velvet Mar 27 27 Of Mice + Men Apr 20 27 Unfinished Cathedral Apr 20 27 Ends + Means Apr 20 Apr 20 My Antónia May 22 May 23 Charles Morgan july 12 It can't happen here Dec 7 Victory vol I Dec 7 Victory vol II Dec 7 Anna Christie Whose body? Black Mischief - Dec 7 To the North. Dec 1 Women are like that. Dec 7 Peking Picknic. Dec. 1 Yang + Yin S.B. wrote Nov. 15 books all returned by Mme P. Jachiet Benodet Finistère wrote Dec 9 enclosing prospectus
1941 THEVES Elizabeth To Nov Oct 30 Mme Jean 1941 24 rue Denfert Rochereau
Oct 24 Theatre Advancing Nov 28 24 On the Art of the Theatre 28 24 Gordon Craig and the Theatre S ren Oct. 30 - Nov. 30 1941 1 m 1v A 25
Nov 28 Portrait of the artist as a young dog! ? returned summer of 1945 1942 Moll Flanders K June 29 Byron's Poetical Works (Oxford Thin paper ed.)
